column2: Formulate an ontology related to condition. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/condition#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Condition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Condition" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing conditions or states that affect entities." .:MedicalCondition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Medical Condition" ;    rdfs:comment "A condition related to health or medical status." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Condition .:WeatherCondition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Weather Condition" ;    rdfs:comment "A condition describing the current state of the weather." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Condition .:AvailabilityCondition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Availability Condition" ;    rdfs:comment "A condition indicating the availability status of an entity." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Condition .:hasSeverity a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has severity" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a condition to its severity level." ;    rdfs:domain :Condition ;    rdfs:range :SeverityLevel .:SeverityLevel a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Severity Level" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing the level of severity of a condition." .:hasPrecipitation a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has precipitation" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a weather condition to its precipitation status." ;    rdfs:domain :WeatherCondition ;    rdfs:range xsd:boolean .:Symptom a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Symptom" ;    rdfs:comment "A manifestation indicating the presence of a medical condition." .:hasSymptom a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has symptom" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a medical condition to its symptoms." ;    rdfs:domain :MedicalCondition ;    rdfs:range :Symptom .:Treatment a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Treatment" ;    rdfs:comment "An intervention or plan intended to manage a medical condition." .:hasTreatment a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has treatment" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a medical condition to its treatment methods." ;    rdfs:domain :MedicalCondition ;    rdfs:range :Treatment .:hasAvailabilityStatus a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has availability status" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates an availability condition to its status level." ;    rdfs:domain :AvailabilityCondition ;    rdfs:range :AvailabilityStatus .:AvailabilityStatus a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Availability Status" ;    rdfs:comment "A class indicating the availability of an entity, such as 'available', 'unavailable', or 'pending'." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: condition. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Condition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Condition" ;    rdfs:comment "A state or situation that exists at a particular time." .:MedicalCondition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Condition ;    rdfs:label "Medical Condition" ;    rdfs:comment "A disease, disorder, or illness that affects the body or mind." .:EnvironmentalCondition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Condition ;    rdfs:label "Environmental Condition" ;    rdfs:comment "Circumstances or factors affecting the environment." .:WeatherCondition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :EnvironmentalCondition ;    rdfs:label "Weather Condition" ;    rdfs:comment "The state of the atmosphere at a particular place and time." .:MaterialCondition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Condition ;    rdfs:label "Material Condition" ;    rdfs:comment "The state or quality of a physical object or material." .:hasSeverity a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Condition ;    rdfs:range :SeverityLevel ;    rdfs:label "has severity" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the severity level of a condition." .:SeverityLevel a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Severity Level" ;    rdfs:comment "A classification indicating the severity of a condition." .:Mild a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :SeverityLevel ;    rdfs:label "Mild" ;    rdfs:comment "A low level of severity." .:Moderate a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :SeverityLevel ;    rdfs:label "Moderate" ;    rdfs:comment "A moderate level of severity." .:Severe a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :SeverityLevel ;    rdfs:label "Severe" ;    rdfs:comment "A high level of severity." .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: condition.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Condition a owl:Class .:ChronicCondition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Condition .:AcuteCondition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Condition .:hasSeverity a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Condition ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .:hasDuration a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Condition ;    rdfs:range xsd:duration .```
